name: AnxietyDisorderICD10CM
title: Anxiety Disorder (ICD10CM)
description: This value set includes ICD10CM concepts for anxiety disorders classified as "other anxiety disorders", including generalized anxiety disorder, panic disorder, mixed anxiety disorder and both other specified and unspecified anxiety disorder.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set includes ICD10CM concepts for anxiety disorders classified as "other anxiety disorders", including generalized anxiety disorder, panic disorder, mixed anxiety disorder and both other specified and unspecified anxiety disorder.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients diagnosed with either generalized anxiety disorder, panic disorder, mixed anxiety disorder, other specified anxiety disorder or unspecified anxiety disorder. This element may map to the "Diagnosis" category of the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes generalized anxiety disorder, panic disorder, mixed anxiety disorder and both other specified and unspecified anxiety disorder.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes dissociative and conversion disorders, obsessive-compulsive disorders, other nonpsychotic mental disorders, phobic anxiety disorders, anxiety due to reactions to severe stress, adjustment disorders, and somatoform disorders.)
